title: INtopBackup

items.title: Illinois Gov. Pritzker says sending troops to Chicago would be an "invasion"
items.description: Illinois Gov. JB Pritzker told CBS News that President Trump has "other aims" aside from fighting crime, as he vows to crack down in Chicago.

items.description: The move aims to subdue anti-government demonstrations that have swept across the country.
